name: Madrid Coffee Table
description: Create the perfect coffee table for your interior with multiple different tabletop and base options. The streamlined design of Madrid makes it stand out. At the same time, the round shape of the table creates a visual softness that opens up any space. The floating design of the Madrid coffee table can easily stand alone but it can also be combined with other tables, such as the Madrid side table, for a more cohesive look. One table – two height options: The cone base of the Madrid coffee table can be mounted at two different heights to suit your space and style.
